communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

This is a request for a mandatory declassification review (MDR), under the terms of section 3.5 of E.O. 13526, for the following:

Materials mentioning or pertaining to the late Russian Federation mercenary leader Yevgeniy Viktorovich Prigozhin, who is widely reported as deceased (see attached PDF). The materials would be found within the Foreign Intelligence and Counterintelligence Operation Records (System of Records: LDIA 10-0002), with listed location as 200 MacDill Blvd, Washington, DC 20340-0001. 

The System of Records Notice named above states that materials may be retrieved via "Name, Social Security Number (SSN), citizenship documentation, biometric data, passport number, vehicle/vessel license data and records." To assist in retrieving relevant materials, here are relevant identifying information:

Personal identifiers
* Full name: Yevgeniy Viktorovich Prigozhin (Roman alphabet); Евге́ний Ви́кторович Приго́жин (Russian Cyrillic); Євгеній Вікторович Пригожин (Ukranian Cyrillic)
* Date of Birth: 01 Jun 1961
* Place of Birth: Leningrad (aka St. Petersburg)

Associated Vehicles
* Aircraft (with tail number and corporate alter-ego): M-VITO, Beratex Group Limited, M-SAAN, Autolex Transport Ltd.; VP-CSP, Linburg Industries LTD. 
* Yacht (vessel name and corporate alter-ego): St. Vitamin, Beratex Group Limited

I request the release of all reasonably segregable material.

T. McElwee
